subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: The left-hander pitched seven scoreless innings and had plenty of support in the first game, which the Mets won 7-0, but their bats were silent in the nightcap and they split the doubleheader.
snippet: The left-hander pitched seven scoreless innings and had plenty of support in the first game, which the Mets won 7-0, but their bats were silent in the nightcap and they split the doubleheader.
